Name: Inazuman Bamboo-Roofed Home: Wild Heart
Desc: A dwelling built in the style of those found in Konda Village. It is pretty well-ventilated, and many who have dwelt under its shade claim that it has let them experience the "leisure of the Inazuman countryside." The children gossip among themselves that the head of the Arataki Gang intends to buy one such house and use it as a base to train the mightiest Onikabuto in the land.
